name: Simple Typing Game
description:
This is a simple Typing game made for the BlackThornProd Game Jam #3 with the Theme of "Less is More". Accordingly, I made a simple typing game about typing words related to Unity C# programming, stressing the idea that "less distractions = more productivity".

It's based on a Typing game tutorial made by Brackeys. 

This is my first "finished" game project, as well as my first time taking part on a Game Jam, so feedback is appreciated! 

Thanks to BlackThornProd, the Brackeys youtube channel and all several Udemy Tutorial makers for helping me take my first steps on my Game Dev Journey!

And thanks to YOU for Downloading!
